TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit HttpClientJsonExtensions extends System.Object
public ref class HttpClientJsonExtensions abstract sealed

summary.span: 包含要以 JSON 形式发送/接收 HTTP 内容的扩展方法。

span.span: Contains the extension methods to send/receive HTTP content as JSON.

param.span: 用于发送请求的客户端。

summary.span: 将 GET 请求发送到指定 URI，并在异步操作中以 JSON 的形式返回反序列化响应正文生成的值。

span.span: Send a GET request to the specified Uri and return the value resulting from deserialize the response body as JSON in an asynchronous operation.

returns.span: 表示异步操作的任务对象。

span.span: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使用 进行反序列化。This method uses for deserialization.

span.span: The type of the value to serialize.

param.span: 用于发送请求的客户端。

span.span: The client used to send the request.

param.name: requestUri
param.span: 请求发送到的 URI。

span.span: The Uri the request is sent to.

param.name: value
param.span: 要序列化的值。

span.span: The value to serialize.

param.name: cancellationToken
param.span: 可由其他对象或线程用以接收取消通知的取消标记。

summary.span: 将 PUT 请求发送到指定 URI，该 URI 包含在请求正文中序列化为 JSON 的 。

span.span: Send a PUT request to the specified Uri containing the serialized as JSON in the request body.

returns.span: 表示异步操作的任务对象。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法 用于序列化。This method uses for serialization.
